comment: "The story took some light interviewing work with 4 different source, though they are all my friends so it wasn't hard to secure interviews. However, I should warn everyone that Glamour has a really rigorous fact-checking process and you're required to submit a LOT of detail about your interviewee, DOB, occupation, contact, on top of screenshots of your conversation, recordings, and transcriptions. The fact-checking department also 100% will reach out to your sources to confirm everything, so there may be a slight delay between filing and the piece being published."
